home.desc1: Although I started coding in 2016, I have been officially a Developer in a technology company since the beginning of 2018.
home.desc2: I used to be a full-stack web developer. Now I focus on front-end web development.
home.desc3: Having first-hand experience in the financial market and other domains as a team leader.
home.desc4: The most outstanding advantages: self-study ability, having high adaptability and working under intense pressure.

about.detail1: Full-stack development excites me a lot, but I prefer Frontend to Backend a little bit.
about.detail2: I gained hands-on experience in building RESTful APIs and responsive Single-Page-Apps (SPA) with both Server-Side Rendering and Client-Side Rendering.
about.thanks: Thank you so much for stopping by my portfolio pages!
